page.title: 03 HOUSE IMPROVEMENT SURVEY
page.content: Many houses in this area have been modernised,so we surveyed to see what modernisation has been done. We found out that thirty per cent of houses have replacement doors.Twenty per cent have had porches built on. Fifteen per cent of people have had some windows replaced in their house, and a further sixteen per cent have had the whole house fitted with new windows. Only two per cent of people have had roof rooms built,maybe because they cost too much.Seven per cent have had extensions on the side or the back of their house.Seven per cent of households have had an extra garage or car port. Twenty four per cent of houses have had their walls painted with water proof paint.Twenty seven per cent have been pebble dashed.
